none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2018-09-fundamental/extracted/Fundamental - 6 Fuckin Blasts/01 Blood On The Tracks

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on September 17, 2018 Description from Terminal Escape:
6 FUCKIN' BLASTS....the title say it all. Los Angeles noize mongers FUNDAMENTAL with yet another dose of amphetamine pogo chaos. In just a hair under ten minutes, these mutants rip and tear and smash their way through blast after blast of classic rudimentary noise punk. If this ain't perfection, then I guess I need to go back to PIG DNA class.Â  6 FUCKIN' BLASTS
